biotools.summary: Online tool for identification of micorRNA-mediated module which is formed by protein-protein interactions (PPIs). It integrates microRNA regulations and PPIs with microRNA/mRNA expression data to identify the perturbed microRNA regulatory modules and reveals their functional roles in specific biological conditions.

bioschemas.name: Mirin
bioschemas.summary: Online tool for identification of micorRNA-mediated module which is formed by protein-protein interactions (PPIs). It integrates microRNA regulations and PPIs with microRNA/mRNA expression data to identify the perturbed microRNA regulatory modules and reveals their functional roles in specific biological conditions.
